Àtụ:Infobox football biography
Emeka Ezeugo (a mụrụ 16 Disemba 1965) bụ onye Naịjiria bụbu ọkaa n'egwuregwu Naịjiria onye mere egwuregwu dị ka ọnọ n'etiti
Ọ rụụrụ ndị klọọbụ India, East Bengal FC, nọchitekwaala anya otu egwuregwu Naịjiria na iko mba ụwa nke FIFA
Ọ chịkwara Abia Warriors FC dị ka onye nkuzi bọọlụ n'ikpeazụ.
A mụrụ Ezeugo n'Aba
Ọ gbara bọọlụ dị ka ọkaa na mba ise gụnyere Connecticut Wolves (A-League na United States), East Bengal, Kolkata, India, Peru na Dhaka Mohammedan n'oge ọrụ egwuregwu afọ iri na ise
O sonyere ndị Mohammedan Sporting na East Bengal ka ọ na-eru na njedebe 1980 ha
Ọ gafere na Danish League ya na klọbụ etiti tebulu Lyngby BK wee gaa n'ihu nke ukwuu nke na ọ rịgoro otu na-anọchite anya Naịjira na 1994 FIFA World Cup
Ọ bịara India maka obere oge na 1997 ịgbara ndị klọọbụ India, Mohun Bagan AC egwuregwu bọọlụ ole na ole
Ezeugo bu ụzọ gbaara ndị otu mba Naijiria egwu na asọmpi Summer Olympics nke afọ 1988 na Seoul, South Korea
A na-etu ya "Emmy", o nwetaara otu nashọnalụ okpu iri na otu n'agbata 1992 na 1994, ma bụrụ onye otu ndị gbazuru asọmpi na iko mba ụwa FIFA  1994
Ezeugo ji ikikere nkụzi bọọlụ nke US ya na ikikere mba ụwa KNVB Netherlands

Ezeugo nwere ndekọ nkuzi afọ asaa na-eweta anyaụfụ, ka ọ mezuru ntugharị ya site na onye ọgbụgba gaa na onye nkịzi nke gụnyere oge ya dị ka onye nkụzi na CoT NYs Borough nke Manhattan Community College na 2002

Na 2003 ọ zụrụ Deportivo Municipal, Lima maka oge abụọ tupu ya nlọghachi na United States, na 15 August 2005 e wee kpọọ ya onye nụzi egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwoke ọhụụ na New York City College of Technology,  ebe a n'agbata 2008.
Ezeuga nọrọ oge okpomọkụ 2004 ruo 2006 ọzụzụ na Camp Chateaugay, ogige okpomọkụ dị na New York's Adirondack Mountains maka ụmụaka dị afọ 7 ruo 15.
Na 19 Eprel 2008, ọ laghachiri India wee binye aka na nkwekọrịta ọrụ ngo dị ka onyeisi nkụzi nke otu bọọlụ ya mbụ Churchill Brothers SC  na 5 Septemba 2008 a tọhapụrụ ya pụọ na nkwekọrịta ya
Ọ bụzị onye isi nkụzi nke Heartland, ọnọdụ o weere ihe pekarịrị otu ọnwa gara aga.  ]
Na 31 October 2013, e mere ya onye isi nkụzi nke otu Nigeria Premier League e buliri ọhụụ Abia Warriors
Nwanne Emeka nwoke bụ Valentine Ezeugo, onye bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ n'India, hụtaara Churchill Bros patron Churchill Alemao onye bugoro iko mba ụwa na Naịjiria.
Na February, 2012 mgbe ọ bụ onye nkụzi nke Mohammedan Sporting Club nke Bangladesh ọ tọghara banye Islam
